description: Welcome to The Summit! This beautifully updated townhome in Citadel features a highly sought-after floor plan with space, comfort, and style. A quiet den greets you off the entry, leading to a dramatic two-storey living room with soaring windows, abundant natural light, and a cozy gas fireplace. Air-conditioning to keep you comfortable in the summer and hot water on demand! The formal dining area flows into the renovated kitchen, bright eating nook, and family room with patio access. Convenient main-floor laundry and powder room. Upstairs offers two bedrooms with a full bath, plus a private master suite with walk-in closet and ensuite. Double garage with direct home access. Steps to top schools, parks, and trailsâ€”this one has it all!
